metadata.dc:description: AIM Adapt to Spanish the 2006 ICCS standardization of terminology of lower urinary tract function in children and adolescents. MATERIAL AND METHOD Discussions have been held at the Consensus Meeting on terminology and concepts. Members of the Spanish group of urodynamics and of the SINUG (Ibero American Society of Neurourology and Urogynecology) have participated. RESULTS AND CONCLUSIONS New definitions and standardized terminology are presented in Spanish. They take into account changes made on the adult scope and the new investigation results. English terms are presented (usually in brackets). Some proposals are discussed (normally in foot notes).
metadata.dc:title: Propuestas de adaptación terminológica al español de la estandarización de la terminología del tracto urinario inferior en niños y adolescentes de la ICCS.
[Proposal of the terminological adaptation to Spanish of the ICCS standardization of terminology of lower urinary tract function in children and adolescents].
